resource_dependency.fundraiserIntroContent: Fundraiser Day is an annual community event aimed at raising funds for local causes. Join us for a day filled with activities, entertainment, and opportunities to make a difference.

function: Introduce the Fundraiser Day event to visitors and provide essential information about the cause and participation.
static_description: A full-width section with a centered heading 'Fundraiser Day', subheading 'Supporting Our Community Together', and descriptive paragraph from fundraiserIntroContent. Background color set to cornsilk.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking anchor links scrolls smoothly to corresponding sections on the page.

carousel_descriptions: Register early and save 20% on entry tickets.
Bring a group of 5 or more and get exclusive pricing.
Enjoy premium seating and meet-and-greet access.

function: Display promotional offers in an automatically rotating carousel with pause functionality on user interaction.
static_description: A horizontal carousel component occupying 80% width of the viewport, featuring images from carousel_images along with overlay titles and descriptions. Navigation arrows and indicators use per control_color. Auto-rotation every 5 seconds unless paused.

interaction_and_states.description: Pauses automatic sliding when mouse hovers over the carousel area.
Clicking left/right arrow buttons navigates to previous/next slide manually.
Clicking indicator dots jumps directly to respective slides.

interaction_and_states.interaction: Key Press: Left Arrow / Right Arrow
interaction_and_states.description: Keyboard navigation moves between slides when focus is within the carousel.

resource_dependency.testimonial_schema: Database table named 'testimonials' with columns: id (UUID), name (TEXT), role (TEXT), quote (TEXT), avatar_url (TEXT)

function: Fetch and display real user testimonials related to past fundraisers dynamically from backend.
static_description: Three-column grid layout showing testimonial cards containing user photo, name, role, and quote. Cards maintain consistent padding and border-radius styling.

resource_dependency.company_info_content: Founded in 2010, Fundraiser Org has raised over $2 million for local charities through community-driven events like Fundraiser Day. We believe in empowering individuals to create lasting impact.

function: Present organizational background, mission statement, contact info, and social presence.
static_description: Two-column section layout â€“ left side displays organization history text (from company_info_content) and right side shows embedded social icons linking to platforms listed under social_links.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking social media icons opens respective profiles in new tabs.

function: Guide users toward learning more about the event through prominent call-to-action placement.
static_description: Sticky bottom CTA bar with large button labeled Learn More About Fundraiser Day using per control_color against cornsilk background. Positioned above fold but visible during scroll.

interaction_and_states.description: Redirects smoothly to #event-intro section upon clicking the CTA button.

resource_dependency.responsive_breakpoints: { mobile: max-width 768px, tablet: min-width 769px and max-width 1024px, desktop: min-width 1025px }

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience across various device sizes without horizontal overflow or misalignment.
static_description: All layout elements adapt fluidly to screen dimensions using CSS media queries. Carousel becomes vertical stack on small screens while testimonials shift from 3-col to 1-col view.

resource_dependency.seo_meta_tags: <meta name="description" content="Join Fundraiser Day, our annual community event supporting local causes."> <meta property="og:title" content="Fundraiser Day"> <meta property="og:description" content="Support your community by joining this impactful fundraising event."> <meta property="og:image" content="/images/event-preview.jpg">

function: Improve search engine visibility and enable rich previews during link sharing.
static_description: Semantic HTML structure with proper H1-H3 hierarchy and meta tags defined in seo_meta_tags included in document head.

function: Allow users to easily share the event page on popular social networks.
static_description: Floating sidebar positioned on the left edge of the screen includes branded share buttons aligned vertically. Icons styled with per control_color theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens native sharing dialog or popup window targeting respective platform URL templates.
